article_headline: I am outraged and 1 want something done!
article_text: Upon calling Gulliver’s Travel in the U.U. to check on my spring break reservations to Mexico, I found that my flight, which I booked four months in advance, is no longer $221 but $310. •A 40 percent increase. •I was not told that my flight was not guaranteed. •I was not told to pay in advance to guarantee my price. •And, I found that the price quoted to me is not even good for flights booked for spring break!
